references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational Bayesian framework for calibrating computer models, which is the basis for the proposed method in this paper.
This book provides the foundational theory and algorithms for Gaussian processes, which are essential to the proposed method's model for computer simulations and uncertainty.

references.paper_title: Bayesian optimization for likelihood-free inference of simulator-based statistical models
references.reason: This paper demonstrates how Bayesian optimization can be used for calibration tasks, providing a relevant baseline and comparison for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Deep Gaussian processes for calibration of computer models
references.reason: This paper introduces a deep Gaussian process approach to calibration, another key related method which the proposed method improves upon.
This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of modern Bayesian experimental design techniques, which are fundamental to the proposed adaptive calibration method.
